verses.verse: בָּעֵ֨ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me פְּסָל־ <S%H6458><s%> pe-sol- unto me Hew לְךָ֞ le-Cha שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- thee two לוּחֹ֤ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot tables אֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim of stone כָּרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> ka-Ri-sho-Nim, like unto the first וַעֲלֵ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> va-'a-Leh and come up אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to הָהָ֑רָה <S%H2022><s%> ha-Ha-rah; unto me into the mount וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and make לְּךָ֖ le-Cha אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron thee an ark עֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> 'Etz. of wood

וְאֶכְתֹּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> ve-'ech-To And I will write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> hal-lu-Chot, on the tables אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim, the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַלֻּחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> hal-lu-Chot tables הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nim that were in the first אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שִׁבַּ֑רְתָּ <S%H7665><s%> shib-Bar-ta; which thou brakest וְשַׂמְתָּ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Tam and thou shalt put בָּאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> ba-'a-Ron. them in the ark

וָאַ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> va-'A-'as And I made אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> 'a-rOn an ark עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim, [of] shittim וָאֶפְסֹ֛ל <S%H6458><s%> va-'ef-Sol and hewed שְׁנֵי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot tables אֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim of stone כָּרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> ka-ri-sho-Nim; like unto the first וָאַ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> va-'A-'al and went up הָהָ֔רָה <S%H2022><s%> ha-Ha-rah, into the mount וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei having the two הַלֻּחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> hal-lu-Chot tables בְּיָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di. in mine hand

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To And he wrote עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַלֻּחֹ֜ת <S%H3871><s%> hal-lu-Chot on the tables כַּמִּכְתָּ֣ב <S%H4385><s%> kam-mich-Tav writing הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, according to the first אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret the ten הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim, commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּר֩ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem to you בָּהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har unto you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh of the fire בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal; of the assembly וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nem gave יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. then

וָאֵ֗פֶן <S%H6437><s%> va-'E-fen, And I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> va-'e-Red myself and came down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, from the mount וָֽאָשִׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> va-'a-Sim and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <S%H3871><s%> hal-lu-Chot, the tables בָּאָר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> ba-'a-Ron in the ark אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti; which I had made וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-Yih-yu become שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, and there כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which צִוַּ֖נִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-ni commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. and there they be as the LORD

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נָֽסְע֛וּ <S%H5265><s%> na-se-'U took their journey מִבְּאֵרֹ֥ת mib-be-'e-Rot בְּנֵי־ be-nei- יַעֲקָ֖ן <S%H885><s%> ya-'a-Kan from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan מוֹסֵרָ֑ה <S%H4149><s%> mo-se-Rah; to Mosera שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There מֵ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> met died אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron there Aaron וַיִּקָּבֵ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and there he was buried שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, and there וַיְכַהֵ֛ן <S%H3547><s%> vay-cha-Hen ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there נָסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> na-se-'U From thence they journeyed הַגֻּדְגֹּ֑דָה <S%H1412><s%> hag-gud-Go-dah; unto Gudgodah וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- and from הַגֻּדְגֹּ֣דָה <S%H1412><s%> hag-gud-Go-dah and from Gudgodah יָטְבָ֔תָה <S%H3193><s%> ya-te-Va-tah, to Jotbath אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz a land נַֽחֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> Na-cha-lei of rivers מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. of waters

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֗וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, he הִבְדִּ֤יל <S%H914><s%> hiv-Dil separated יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> hal-le-Vi, of Levi לָשֵׂ֖את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD לַעֲמֹד֩ <S%H5975><s%> la-'a-Mod to stand לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לְשָֽׁרְתוֹ֙ <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-re-To to minister וּלְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-le-va-Rech unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> bish-Mo, in his name עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah have לְלֵוִ֛י <S%H3881><s%> le-le-Vi Leviite חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> ve-na-cha-Lah nor inheritance עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; with his brethren יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To, [is] his inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְאָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I עָמַ֣דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mad-ti And I stayed בָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> va-Har, in the mount כַּיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> kai-ya-Mim time הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-Ri-sho-Nim, according to the first אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; nights וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> gam also בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> bap-Pa-'am unto me at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- was not אָבָ֥ה <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vah would יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh also [and] the LORD הַשְׁחִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7843><s%> hash-chi-Te-cha. not destroy

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum unto me Arise לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech proceed לְמַסַּ֖ע <S%H4550><s%> le-mas-Sa' [thy] journey לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; the people וְיָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo-'u that they may go in וְיִֽרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> ve-yir-Shu and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tam unto their fathers לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem. פ Peh

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, And now Israel מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> mah what יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God שֹׁאֵ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> sho-'El require מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> me-'im-Mach; with כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but לְ֠יִרְאָה <S%H3372><s%> Le-yir-'ah of thee but to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to walk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all דְּרָכָיו֙ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chav in all his ways וּלְאַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H157><s%> u-le-'a-ha-Vah and to love אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וְלַֽעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> ve-la-'a-Vod him and to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha with all thy heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. and with all thy soul

לִשְׁמֹ֞ר <S%H8104><s%> lish-Mor To keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְוֹ֤ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot the commandments יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tav, and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; thee this day לְט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> le-Tov good לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

הֵ֚ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD'S אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim Behold the heaven וּשְׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> u-she-Mei and the heaven הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heavens הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

רַ֧ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but בַּאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> ba-'a-vo-Tei-cha in thy fathers חָשַׁ֥ק <S%H2836><s%> cha-Shak had a delight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Only the LORD לְאַהֲבָ֣ה <S%H157><s%> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam; וַיִּבְחַ֞ר <S%H977><s%> vai-yiv-Char them and he chose בְּזַרְעָ֣ם <S%H2233><s%> be-zar-'Am their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after בָּכֶ֛ם ba-Chem מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim them [even] you above all people כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this
